titleStmt.title: To the Most Reverend Father in God, William Lord Archbishop of Canterbury
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Juxon, William, 1582-1663.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker,

notesStmt.note: Consists of a letter (p.: 1-3) dated Oct. 14, 1662, accompanying and enjoining the observance of the "Directions concerning preachers" (p. 4-8), and a letter (p. 9-10) dated Oct. 23, 1662, to Gilbert, Lord Bishop of London, from William, Archbishop of Canterbury.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
